Parabolic class boundary data

Source: R/data.R
parabolic.Rd

Parabolic class boundary data

Value

parabolic

a data frame

Details

These data were simulated. There are two correlated predictors and two classes in the factor outcome.

Examples

data(parabolic)

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(parabolic, aes(x = X1, y = X2, col = class)) +
 geom_point(alpha = .5) +
 theme_bw()

Contents

discrim is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.

Developed by Max Kuhn. Site built by pkgdown.
